info.name: Smart Meter Backend API
info.description:
Comprehensive API collection for Smart Meter Backend System with hierarchy-based access control.

**Hierarchy Levels:**
- Root Admin (ETL Admin) - Full access to all endpoints
- Tenant Admin - Manages tenant and below
- Customer Admin - Manages customer and below
- Consumer - Limited access to own data

**Complete Flow:** Start from "5. Complete Flow" folder for step-by-step setup.

item.name: 0. Authentication

exec: // Store token based on user level
// Check if root admin (entity_id would be null in entity table)

request.description: Login with email and password. Token is automatically stored in environment.
Register a new user. Requires entity_id and role_id.
Verify JWT token validity.

item.description: Authentication endpoints - Login, Register, and Token Verification

item.name: 1. Root Admin - Full Access
Modules

request.description: Get all system modules. Root Admin only.
Get module by ID. Root Admin only.
Create a new system module. Root Admin only.
Update module. Root Admin only.
Delete module. Root Admin only. Warning: Check if module is referenced in roles.

item.description: Module Management - Root Admin Only

item.name: Profiles

request.description: Root Admin can see all profiles (global + entity-scoped). Use entityId=null for global only.
Get profile by ID. Root Admin can access global and entity-scoped profiles.
Create global profile (entity_id = null). Root Admin only.
Create entity-scoped profile. Root Admin can create for any entity.
Update profile. Root Admin can update any profile.
Delete profile. Warning: Check if profile is used by entities.

item.description: Profile Management - Root Admin has full access

item.name: Entities

request.description: Root Admin can see all entities across all tenants.
Root Admin can access any entity.
Get full hierarchy tree from entity (includes all descendants).
Create root entity (entity_id = null). Root Admin only.
Create tenant entity under root entity.
Update entity. Root Admin can update any entity.
Delete entity. Warning: This will cascade delete all descendants.

item.description: Entity Management - Root Admin has full access

item.name: Roles

request.description: List global roles (entity_id = null). Root Admin only.
List roles for specific entity. Root Admin can access any entity.
Get role by ID. Root Admin can access any role.
Create global role (entityId = null). Root Admin only.
Create role for specific entity. Root Admin can create for any entity.
Update role. Root Admin can update any role.

item.description: Role Management - Root Admin has full access

item.name: Users

request.description: List users for entity. Root Admin can access any entity.
Get user by ID. Root Admin can access any user.
Create user. Root Admin can create for any entity.
Update user. Root Admin can update any user.
Delete user (soft delete). Root Admin can delete any user.
Change current user's password.

item.description: User Management - Root Admin has full access

item.name: Meters

request.description: List meters for entity. Root Admin can access any entity.
Get meter by ID. Root Admin can access any meter.
Create meter. Root Admin can create for any entity.
Update meter. Root Admin can update any meter.

item.description: Meter Management - Root Admin has full access

Root Admin (ETL Admin) has access to ALL endpoints including:
- Module Management (system-wide)
- Global Profile Management
- All Entity Operations
- All User/Role/Meter Operations

item.name: 2. Tenant Admin - Tenant & Below
Profiles

request.description: Tenant Admin can see global profiles + profiles for accessible entities.
List profiles for tenant's entity only.
Create entity-scoped profile. Tenant Admin can create for own entity only.
Get profile. Can only access global or own entity profiles.

item.description: Profile Management - Tenant Admin can manage entity-scoped profiles

item.name: Entities

request.description: List entities in tenant's hierarchy (tenant + customers + consumers).
Get tenant's own entity.
Get full hierarchy from tenant (includes all customers and consumers).
Create customer entity under tenant. Tenant Admin can only create under own entity.
Update tenant's own entity.

item.description: Entity Management - Tenant Admin can manage own hierarchy

item.name: Roles

request.description: List roles for tenant's entity.
Create role for customer entity. Tenant Admin can create for entities in own hierarchy.
Get role. Can only access global or own entity roles.

item.description: Role Management - Tenant Admin can manage entity-scoped roles

item.name: Users

request.description: List users for entity in tenant's hierarchy.
Create user. Tenant Admin can create for entities in own hierarchy.
Get user. Can only access users in own hierarchy.

item.description: User Management - Tenant Admin can manage users in own hierarchy

item.name: Meters

request.description: List meters for entity in tenant's hierarchy.
Create meter. Tenant Admin can create for entities in own hierarchy.

item.description: Meter Management - Tenant Admin can manage meters in own hierarchy

Tenant Admin has access to:
- Own entity and all descendants (Customer, Consumer)
- Entity-scoped Profiles (for own hierarchy)
- Entity-scoped Roles (for own hierarchy)
- Users in own hierarchy
- Meters in own hierarchy

**CANNOT access:**
- Modules
- Global Profiles
- Other tenant's data

item.name: 3. Customer Admin - Customer & Below
Entities

request.description: List entities in customer's hierarchy (customer + consumers).
Get customer's own entity.
Create consumer entity under customer. Customer Admin can only create under own entity.

item.description: Entity Management - Customer Admin can manage own hierarchy

item.name: Roles

request.description: List roles for customer's entity.
Create role for consumer entity.

item.description: Role Management - Customer Admin can manage roles in own hierarchy

item.name: Users

request.description: Create user for consumer entity.
List users for consumer entity.

item.description: User Management - Customer Admin can manage users in own hierarchy

item.name: Meters

request.description: Create meter for consumer entity.
List meters for consumer entity.

item.description: Meter Management - Customer Admin can manage meters in own hierarchy

Customer Admin has access to:
- Own entity and descendants (Consumers)
- Entity-scoped Profiles (for own hierarchy)
- Entity-scoped Roles (for own hierarchy)
- Users in own hierarchy
- Meters in own hierarchy

**CANNOT access:**
- Modules
- Global Profiles
- Tenant or other tenant's data

item.name: 4. Consumer - Limited Access

request.description: Get consumer's own entity information.
List meters for consumer's own entity.
Get meter by ID. Consumer can only access meters in own entity.

item.description: Consumer - Limited access to own entity and meters
